Header.title: Tracking the Application
Header.paragraph: An ATS allows recruiters to match job requisitions to the job-posting sites and the social media channels most appropriate for specific candidates.

About.paragraph: An applicant tracking system (ATS) is software for recruiters and employers to track candidates throughout the recruiting and hiring process.
Why: Saves time for more focused work.
Provides Better and Faster Resume Parsing.
Acts as a Single Source of Truth.
Makes Job Posting Easier and Faster.
Why2: Makes Job Posting Easier and Faster.

Services.name: Woridwide Applications
Services.text: Worldwide Applications is a company that develops custom information systems for customers and consumers.

Services.name: Product Authentication
Services.text: Product authentication is a technology that uses hardware and software to verify a product. It can also involve using a mobile device to check a product's authenticity

Services.name: Platform Vulnerable
Services.text: Platform independent refers to software that can run on multiple hardware platforms or operating systems.

Features.title: Candidate feedback
Features.text: Your positive attitude and friendliness made interviewing you a pleasure.You spoke knowledgeably about the topics we covered in the interview and demonstrated expertise in the field.

Features.title: Job specific Filters
Features.text: How do I get my resume through filters? One of the most important steps to get your resume past online filters is to customize it for each job you apply for.

Features.title: Accelerates hiring process
Features.text: What is the process of hiring? It is a process that involves everything from identifying, attracting, screening, shortlisting, interviewing, selecting, hiring, and onboarding employees.

Features.title: Focused work
Features.text: What is the focus of work? How to Focus Better at Work: 13 Ways to Stay Focused. Focus is a person's ability to concentrate on a single point or task.
